Original:
今天晚上3個人去，各點了長島冰茶、Mojito、茶酒，
第一杯上茶酒就傻眼了，就是Rum+原萃綠茶，沒有更多了，喝了一口茶是茶酒精是酒精$300元+10%服務費；
第二杯是Mojito，整杯藍色的，沒有任何薄荷葉，付完錢老闆娘還說抱歉忘記加糖了⋯$300+10%🙄
只有長島冰茶還算正常$350+10%，
付完錢老闆娘還一直笑笑說不好意思啦，我員工今天沒來我不太會調酒，
也沒有任何打折跟補償，
我很想跟老闆娘說：你員工休假，妳本人不會調酒就賣啤酒就好，不會調就別做了😊
最好是把我的錢還我～雷到爆😊

*謝謝老闆娘回覆，也提醒老闆娘，大家的錢都是辛苦賺來的，純一直道歉也不能抹去調酒品質只值一顆星的事實唷😉
EN:
Three people went tonight, and each ordered Long Island Ice Tea, Mojito, Tea Wine,
The first cup of tea is dumbfounded, that is, Rum+original green tea, there is no more, drink a sip of tea is tea alcohol or 300 yuan+10%service fee;
The second cup is Mojito, the whole cup is blue, without any mint leaves, the boss also said sorry for forgetting to add sugar ... $ 300+10%🙄 🙄 🙄
Only Nagao Ice Tea is normal at $ 350+10%,
After paying the money, the boss mother has always smiled and said sorry for my employees.
There is no discount or compensation,
I really want to say to the boss: your employee is on vacation, you will sell beer if you don’t know how to mix alcohol. Don't make it if you don’t adjust it.
It's best to return my money to me ~ Thunder to explosion 😊

*Thank you for replying to the boss, and also reminded the boss that everyone’s money is hard to earn, and the fact that the quality of the bartender can not be erased.
